directions: Combine coconut milk beverage, banana, and sweetener in a blender; blend until smooth. Fill a large glass with ice and pour pureed banana milk on top.
Combine boiling water, coffee granules, and sugar in a tall container. Whip with an immersion blender or a hand mixer until foamy, about 2 minutes. Pour coffee foam over the banana milk.
ingredients: 1 cup coconut milk beverage (such as Silk®)
title: Vegan Banana Whipped Iced Coffee
